data.name: Don't Starve Together: Swashbuckler Survivors Chest
data.detailed_description:
Swashbuckler Survivors Chest

Try the pirate's life on for size and set sail in these strikingly sea-worthy ensembles.

Includes
  • Wigfrid's Swashbuckler Skin Set
  • Willow's Swashbuckler Skin Set
  • Winona's Swashbuckler Skin Set
  • Wortox's Swashbuckler Skin Set
  • Warly's Swashbuckler Skin Set
  • Wes' Swashbuckler Skin Set
  • Wolfgang's Swashbuckler Skin Set
  • Woodie's Swashbuckler Skin Set
  • Wurt's Swashbuckler Skin Set

data.short_description: This Swashbuckler Chest contains skins for: Wigfrid, Willow, Winona, Wortox, Warly, Wes, Wolfgang, Woodie, and Wurt.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
